titles.title: A resolution reaffirming the United States-Egypt partnership and the Egyptian people's right to free, fair, credible, and peaceful elections on March 26, 2018.
A resolution reaffirming the United States-Egypt partnership and the Egyptian people's right to free, fair, credible, and peaceful elections on March 26, 2018.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

term.name: Rule of law and government transparency
Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary:
Affirms the U.S.-Egypt partnership.
Urges the government of Egypt to take meaningful steps to enable credible and peaceful presidential elections in March 2018 and in the future.
